subject: Fwd: Thanks, we are ready to lend some cash
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
 
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
 
$396,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest monthly payments!
 
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this elementary form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
 
http://ouarxqrpon.com/
